name: BreakThrough (kkekk)
description:
A simple game for my Uni Project of combining two Classic games together (Atari Breakout/Arkanoid (Powerups) + Space invaders)

Controls:

Player1:

Left/Right - A/D

Jump - W

Player2:

Left/Right - Left Arrow/Right Arrow

Jump - Up Arrow

Both:

Release ball - Space bar

All Resources (Art, Sound, Tutorials) are credited in README.txt
